verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Through You the blind will see.
Through You the mute will speak.
Through You all hearts will pray.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Through You the dead will rise,
Through You the darkness flees,
Through You my heart screams
I am free.
I am free.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I am free to run.(echo)
I am free to dance.(echo)
And I am free to live for You.(echo)
